channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Kitchen Sale
channel.desc: Tantalise those taste buds with a selection of kitchen products, which are guaranteed to help you cook like an expert. Join our guests for the latest in gourmet delights - all at great prices.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Silentnight with Free Delivery
channel.desc: Sleep soundly this season with a little help from the experts at Silentnight, with free P&P across the range. From fabulous mattresses to beautiful bedding, discover ways to catch some ZZZs on offer.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Izabel London Fashion Sale
channel.desc: Join us for an Izabel London sale and find fantastic prices on fashion for the trend-conscious woman. Izabel London strives to offer a diverse range of looks and fits so there's something or everyone.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Top Offers up to 60% Off
channel.desc: Explore fantastic savings of up to 60% off across a variety of categories at QVC. Whether it's fashion, home or beauty, discover amazing deals today.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ultrasun Professional Suncare
channel.desc: Ultrasun have the answer to your summer holidays with once-a-day suncare protection. Tune in to find out which product is best for you and your family all year round.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Silentnight with Free Delivery
channel.desc: Sleep soundly this season with a little help from the experts at Silentnight, with free P&P across the range. From fabulous mattresses to beautiful bedding, discover ways to catch some ZZZs on offer.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Laura Geller Make-up
channel.desc: Laura Geller is a renowned make-up artist, teacher and working mother and the creative force behind one of the most successful make-up studios in New York. Join us to explore her superb range.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Fashion on Friday
channel.desc: Explore chic and fuss-free fashion with Nina Leonard. You'll find a range of stylish and flattering pieces for every occasion, designed to make you look and feel amazing.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Good Sleep
channel.desc: Feel the benefits of The Good Sleep with products that help you feel refreshed when you wake up, including expert supplements, hi-tech tools and luxury bedding to sink into.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Silentnight with Free Delivery
channel.desc: Sleep soundly this season with a little help from the experts at Silentnight, with free P&P across the range. From fabulous mattresses to beautiful bedding, discover ways to catch some ZZZs on offer.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Friday Night Beauty
channel.desc: Gorgeous meets groundbreaking every Friday night on QVC, with a showcase of the best of the best in skincare, cosmetics, haircare and beauty tools - it's not to be missed.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Dyson
channel.desc: Vacuum your home with help from the iconic and much-loved British brand Dyson. We will be showcasing unique packages with added accessories, as well as discovering Dyson's new innovative technology.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Sleep Tight with Silentnight
channel.desc: Discover the wonders of Silentnight including bed frames, mattresses, divan sets, pillows and duvets, all designed to help give you a peaceful and comfortable sleep.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Sigma Beauty
channel.desc: Find your new beauty favourites with Sigma's unrivalled selection. You'll find a fabulous range of makeup, brushes and cleaning items so you can create that perfect base every single day.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Big Brands with Dyson
channel.desc: Give your home a refresh for the coming season with Dyson. Don't miss out on this fantastic show and discover all their latest technology to clean, filter, and transform your home.

channel.desc: Discover incredible garden finds all with no P&P to pay! From gorgeous plants to terrific tools, shop for everything you need with free delivery today, and get your summer garden looking splendid.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Adesso Footwear
channel.desc: Adesso is a rapidly growing British design-led brand offering fun and fabulous ladies footwear. If you love colour and want something that little bit different, you'll love Adesso.
